column4: the base problem is that the kernel prioritizes i/o operations higher than sound and if your cpu is busy loading a file, it can't move audio data fast enough
Ampbelin: I've used several other operating systems on the same machine and had no problems. Is there anyway to remedy it?
what audio system, what hardware, what version of ubuntu?
I'm using ubuntu 10.10 desktop with a Creative soundblaster 24 bit Live. I have a Pentium 4 3.0 GHz with 512MB RAM and 200GB HDD
